importantArticles.headline: RBC Capital Markets has downgraded Cemex SAB de CV (NYSE:CX) to "underperform," citing heightened risks tied to the company's heavy reliance on the U.S.-Mexico trade relationship.  The downgrade, accompanied by a reduction in the stock's price target to $5 from $6, comes in the wake of the recent U.S. presidential election, which has introduced uncertainty around potential trade tariffs and import policies.  Analysts said that the potential for a 25% tariff on Mexican goods, a measure that could significantly disrupt Cemex's operations and revenue streams.
importantArticles.title: Cemex stock downgraded amid US-Mexico trade risks
